data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Salcedo, Dominican Republic that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Salcedo, Dominican Republic
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 10,449 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Salcedo.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Salcedo, Dominican Republic honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Salcedo, Dominican Republic to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Japanese people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Salcedo, Dominican Republic.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Salcedo, Dominican Republic.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Salcedo, Dominican Republic has a population of 96,400.

We estimate Salcedo has 10,449 people who might know Jesus, 79,967 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 5,984 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help the 10,449 believers in Salcedo to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests
